availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Calloway County, Kentucky. Moved to Simpson County in 1829 with his parents. Graduated from Wirt College (Tennessee) in 1849. Admitted to the Kentucky bar in 1850. Worked as the County Attorney of Simpson County from 1857-1862. Politically, Milliken was a Democrat.

Spouse: Sally H. Milliken
Children: John H. Milliken

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, page 149.
Biographical Directory of the United States Congress, "Charles William Milliken," http://bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=M000768 accessed 05/17/2017.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, "Charles William Milliken," https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=9368472&ref=acom accessed 05/17/2017.
